LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit.label: 고압 전선
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit.description: A set of heavy electrical cables for moving power around. They are very strong and non-flammable.
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit_Blueprint.label: heavy 전선 (청사진)
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit_Frame.label: heavy 전선 (건설 중)
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit_Frame.description: A set of heavy electrical cables for moving power around. They are very strong and non-flammable.
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible.label: 매립 전선
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. This one is hidden in the ground.
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible_Blueprint.label: hidden 전선 (청사진)
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible_Frame.label: hidden 전선 (건설 중)
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible_Frame.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. This one is hidden in the ground.
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_Blueprint_Install.label: power switch (청사진)
LanguageData.PowerSwitchFlicker.label: 자동 전원 관리 스위치
LanguageData.PowerSwitchFlicker_Blueprint.label: 자동 전원 관리 스위치(청사진)
LanguageData.PowerSwitchFlicker_Frame.label: power switch flicker (건설 중)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch.label: 타이머 전원 스위치
LanguageData.TimerSwitch.description: 시간에 따라 전원을 크고 키는 스위치
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Blueprint.label: 타이머 전원 스위치 (청사진)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Blueprint_Install.label: 타이머 전원 스위치 (청사진)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Frame.label: 타이머 전원 스위치 (건설 중)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Frame.description: 시간에 따라 전원을 크고 키는 스위치.
LanguageData.FissionBattery.label: 핵분열 축전기
LanguageData.FissionBattery.description: Stores electricity and recycles charge using fission processes. Slightly more efficient than standard batteries. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet. Holds up to 4,000 W.
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Blueprint.label: fission 축전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Blueprint_Install.label: fission 축전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Frame.label: fission 축전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Frame.description: Stores electricity and recycles charge using fission processes. Slightly more efficient than standard batteries. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet. Holds up to 4,000 W.
LanguageData.SolarGenerator_Blueprint_Install.label: 태양광 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator.label: 향상된 태양광 발전기
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator_Blueprint.label: 향상된 태양광 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator_Frame.label: 향상된 태양광 발전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator_Frame.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine.label: 향상된 풍력 발전기
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine.description: A wind-powered electrical 발전기. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine_Blueprint.label: 향상된 풍력 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine_Frame.label: 향상된 풍력 발전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine_Frame.description: A wind-powered electrical 발전기. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.BioGenerator.label: 친환경 디젤 화력 발전기
LanguageData.BioGenerator.description: A bio-generator that produces electricity. Requires Biodiesel for a 연료 source. 발전량 : 1000 W.
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Blueprint.label: bio-generator (청사진)
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Blueprint_Install.label: bio-generator (청사진)
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Frame.label: bio-generator (건설 중)
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Frame.description: A bio-generator that produces electricity. Requires Biodiesel for a 연료 source. 발전량 : 1000 W.
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant.label: 석탄 화력 발전기
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant.description: The 석탄 Power Plant that produces electricity by burning 석탄-like fuels. Can be fueled with 석탄 광석 or Peat. 발전량 : 2,000 W.
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant_Blueprint.label: 석탄 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant_Frame.label: 석탄 발전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant_Frame.description: The 석탄 Power Plant that produces electricity by burning 석탄-like fuels. Can be fueled with 석탄 광석 or Peat. 발전량 : 2,000 W.
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.label: 경유 화력 발전기
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.description: A Fuel Power Plant that produces electricity. Can be fueled with Fuel, 프로메튬 or FSX. 발전량 : 3,500 W.
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Blueprint.label: 연료 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Frame.label: 연료 발전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Frame.descripti: A Fuel Power Plant that produces electricity. Can be fueled with Fuel, 프로메튬 or FSX. 발전량 : 3,500 W.
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator.label: 열전자 발전기
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator.description: Produces electricity from differences in temperatures between two rooms. Should be placed in a wall. Example: At 1,600 C (2,912 F) difference, power output is 16,200 W at 600% efficiency.
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator_Blueprint.label: 열전자 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator_Frame.label: 열전자 발전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator_Frame.descriptio: Produces electricity from differences in temperatures between two rooms. Should be placed in a wall. Example: At 1,600 C (2,912 F) difference, power output is 16,200 W at 600% efficiency.
LanguageData.NPP.label: 핵 발전기
LanguageData.NPP.description: A Nuclear Power Plant with 24,000 W power output. Requires a hopper with Enriched 우라늄 as a 연료 source. WARNING: In case of a 핵 meltdown, build walls around the 잔해 to contain the radiation
LanguageData.NPP_Blueprint.label: 핵 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.NPP_Frame.label: 핵 발전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.NPP_Frame.description: A Nuclear Power Plant with 24,000 W power output. Requires a hopper with Enriched 우라늄 as a 연료 source. WARNING: In case of a 핵 meltdown, build walls around the 잔해 to contain the radiation
LanguageData.NPPD.label: 핵 발전기 잔해
LanguageData.NPPD.description: Radioactive 잔해 of a Nuclear Power Plant. Build walls around it to contain the radiation
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine.label: 수직 풍력 발전기
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine.description: A wind-powered gause electrical 발전기. Please keep all limbs and pets away from the turbine area발전량 : 2250 W at maximum wind speed.
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine_Blueprint.label: Gause 풍력 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine_Frame.label: Gause 풍력 발전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine_Frame.description: A wind-powered gause electrical 발전기. Please keep all limbs and pets away from the turbine area발전량 : 2250 W at maximum wind speed.
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower.label: 테슬라 번개 발전기
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower.description: Harness the incredible power source of lightning through the invention of Nikola Tesla, the Tesla Lightning GeneratorIt needs to cool off from time to time when it gets too hot. 발전량 : 6,000 W.
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower_Blueprint.label: tesla lightning 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower_Frame.label: tesla lightning 발전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower_Frame.description: Harness the incredible power source of lightning through the invention of Nikola Tesla, the Tesla Lightning GeneratorIt needs to cool off from time to time when it gets too hot. 발전량 : 6,000 W.
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant.label: 플라즈마 반응로
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant.description: Produces tax-free electricity from a steam geyser. Must be placed on a steam geyser. A Plasma Generator can be linked to absorb 플라즈마 discharges. Requires to be fueled by 주석 or Aluminium.
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant_Blueprint.label: 플라즈마 반응로 (청사진)
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant_Frame.label: 플라즈마 반응로 (건설 중)
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant_Frame.description: Produces tax-free electricity from a steam geyser. Must be placed on a steam geyser. A Plasma Generator can be linked to absorb 플라즈마 discharges. Requires to be fueled by 주석 or Aluminium.
LanguageData.PlasmaGen.label: 플라즈마 발전기
LanguageData.PlasmaGen.description: Produces tax-free electricity through 플라즈마 discharges from a Plasma Reactor. It needs to be fully charged first.
LanguageData.PlasmaGen_Blueprint.label: 플라즈마 발전기 (청사진)
LanguageData.PlasmaGen_Frame.label: 플라즈마 발전기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.PlasmaGen_Frame.description: Produces tax-free electricity through 플라즈마 discharges from a Plasma Reactor. It needs to be fully charged first.
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine.label: 제논 이온 터빈
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine.description: Must be placed on a steam geyser. The Xenon-Ion Turbine produces power from extreme heat, and efficiency can go above 100%. Example: At 250 C (482 F) power output is 5,000 W with 150% efficiency.
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine_Blueprint.label: xenon-ion turbine (청사진)
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine_Frame.label: xenon-ion turbine (건설 중)
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine_Frame.description: Must be placed on a steam geyser. The Xenon-Ion Turbine produces power from extreme heat, and efficiency can go above 100%. Example: At 250 C (482 F) power output is 5,000 W with 150% efficiency.
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor.label: 반물질 반응로
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor.description: The contained 반물질 separates from normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that 핵 반응로s capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions. 발전량 : 32,000 W.
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor_Blueprint.label: 반물질 반응로 (청사진)
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor_Frame.label: 반물질 반응로 (건설 중)
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor_Frame.description: The contained 반물질 separates from normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that 핵 반응로s capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions. 발전량 : 32,000 W.
